#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define f first
#define s second
#define pii pair< int, int >
#define inf 1<<30
using namespace std;
int point[1005][2];
int min_dis[1005],n;
bool vis[1005];
void dijkstra()
{
    priority_queue< pii > p;
    p.push(mp(0,0));
    vis[0]=true;
    while(!vis[n+1])
    {
        pii cur=p.top(); p.pop();
        int dis=-cur.f,idx=cur.s;
        if(min_dis[idx]<dis) continue;
        vis[idx]=true;
        for(int i=1;i<=n+1;i++)
        {
            int x=point[idx][0]-point[i][0]; int y=point[idx][1]-point[i][1];
            int d=x*x + y*y;
            if(min_dis[i]>dis+d)
            {
                min_dis[i]=dis+d;
                p.push(mp(-min_dis[i],i));
            }
        }
    }
}
int main()
{
  //freopen("x.txt","r",stdin);
  scanf("%d",&n);
  point[0][0]=point[0][1]=0; min_dis[0]=inf;
  for(int i=1;i<=n+1;i++)
  {
      scanf("%d%d",&point[i][0],&point[i][1]);
      min_dis[i]=inf;
  }
  memset(vis,0,sizeof(vis));
  dijkstra();
  printf("%d",min_dis[n+1]);
  return 0;
}
